cell.desc: You are in a small training cell. A torch rests on the wall. The guard leans against the door, watching you.

hall.desc: A narrow hallway lined with moss. It stretches east, while the cell lies to the south.

yard.desc: An open yard with tall grass and a pale sky. Paths lead back west.

torch.name: Torch
torch.desc: A simple wooden torch. Useful for light.

guard.name: Training Guard
dialogue: The guard says: "Try the Look button. It will help you see what's here."
The guard says: "Now Take the torch. Use the Take button, then type 'torch'."
The guard says: "Finally, Talk to me with the Talk button â€” you're nearly there."
The guard says: "You're ready. I'll open the door to the north. Explore, improvise, even change the rules if you wish."
